Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Dolby Stereo
Synopsis: When George, a shy and awkward introvert, meets Alicia, a stunning Latin girl, he is instantly smitten. Unfortunately, George is due to marry a childhood friend from Nigeria in just four days' time. When Gerard, a boisterous and lovesick Frenchman stumbles into George's life, the stage is set for a gentle, humorous love story. "Jump Tomorrow" is a road-movie that weaves reality and fantasy into a comic tale of the quirks and passions of modern romance.
Title: Jump Tomorrow
